verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that וַיָּ֕מָת <S%H4191><s%> died מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> that the king בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֑וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned חָנ֥וּן <S%H2586><s%> and Hanun בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> David אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> I will shew חֶ֣סֶד ׀ <S%H2617><s%> kindness עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with חָנ֣וּן <S%H2586><s%> unto Hanun בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נָחָ֗שׁ <S%H5176><s%> of Nahash כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> shewed אָבִ֤יו <S%H1><s%> as his father עִמָּדִי֙ <S%H5978><s%> against חֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> kindness וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent דָּוִ֧ד <S%H1732><s%> unto me And David לְנַחֲמ֛וֹ <S%H5162><s%> to comfort בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> him by the hand עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> for his father וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> came עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David's אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> And the princes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to חָנ֣וּן <S%H2586><s%> unto Hanun אֲדֹֽנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H113><s%> their lord הַֽמְכַבֵּ֨ד <S%H3513><s%> doth honour דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> thou that David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> thy father בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> Thinkest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that he hath sent לְךָ֖ מְנַֽחֲמִ֑ים <S%H5162><s%> comforters הֲ֠לוֹא <S%H3808><s%> not בַּעֲב֞וּר <S%H5668><s%> unto thee to חֲק֤וֹר <S%H2713><s%> search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> the city וּלְרַגְּלָ֣הּ <S%H7270><s%> and to spy it out וּלְהָפְכָ֔הּ <S%H2015><s%> and to overthrow שָׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> [rather] sent דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> unto thee? hath not David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took חָנ֜וּן <S%H2586><s%> Wherefore Hanun אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> servants דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David's וַיְגַלַּח֙ <S%H1548><s%> and shaved off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> the one half זְקָנָ֔ם <S%H2206><s%> of their beards וַיִּכְרֹ֧ת <S%H3772><s%> and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַדְוֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4063><s%> their garments בַּחֵ֖צִי <S%H2677><s%> in the middle עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> far שְׁתֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8357><s%> [even] to their buttocks וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> and sent them away

וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> When they told לְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> [it] unto David וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> he sent לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <S%H7125><s%> to meet כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> them because the men נִכְלָמִ֣ים <S%H3637><s%> ashamed מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> were greatly וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and the king שְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> Tarry בִֽירֵח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> at Jericho עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until יְצַמַּ֥ח <S%H6779><s%> be grown זְקַנְכֶ֖ם <S%H2206><s%> until your beards וְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H7725><s%> and [then] return

וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִבְאֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H887><s%> that they stank בְּדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> before David וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּ֡וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיִּשְׂכְּרוּ֩ <S%H7936><s%> and hired אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרַ֨ם <S%H758><s%> the Syrians בֵּית־ רְח֜וֹב <S%H1050><s%> of Bethrehob וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרַ֣ם <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians צוֹבָ֗א <S%H6678><s%> of Zoba עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand רַגְלִ֔י <S%H7273><s%> footmen וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and of king מַֽעֲכָה֙ <S%H4601><s%> Maacah אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men ט֔וֹב <S%H2897><s%> Tob שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H376><s%> men אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> heard דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> And when David וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> of [it] he sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַצָּבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> and all the host הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty men

וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> came out בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיַּעַרְכ֥וּ <S%H6186><s%> in array מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> and put the battle פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> at the entering in הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate וַאֲרַ֨ם <S%H758><s%> and the Syrians צוֹבָ֤א <S%H6678><s%> of Zoba וּרְחוֹב֙ <S%H7340><s%> and of Rehob וְאִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> he ט֣וֹב <S%H2897><s%> Tob וּמַֽעֲכָ֔ה <S%H4601><s%> and Maacah לְבַדָּ֖ם <S%H905><s%> [were] by themselves בַּשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> in the field

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> When Joab כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> was set אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> against פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that the front הַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of the battle מִפָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> was against him before וּמֵֽאָח֑וֹר <S%H268><s%> and behind וַיִּבְחַ֗ר <S%H977><s%> he chose מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּחוּרֵ֣י <S%H970><s%> young [בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל כ] (יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel ק) וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֖ךְ <S%H6186><s%> and put [them] in array לִקְרַ֥את <S%H7125><s%> against אֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> the Syrians

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> And the rest הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people נָתַ֕ן <S%H5414><s%> he delivered בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אַבְשַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> of Abishai אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brother וַֽיַּעֲרֹ֕ךְ <S%H6186><s%> that he might put [them] in array לִקְרַ֖את <S%H7125><s%> against בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> be too strong אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> If the Syrians מִמֶּ֔נִּי <S%H4480><s%> are too וְהָיִ֥תָה <S%H1961><s%> become לִּ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3467><s%> and help וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> me but if the children עַמּוֹן֙ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon יֶחֱזְק֣וּ <S%H2388><s%> be too strong מִמְּךָ֔ <S%H4480><s%> are too וְהָלַכְתִּ֖י <S%H1980><s%> for thee then I will come לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַֽ <S%H3467><s%> to help לָֽךְ׃

חֲזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> Be of good courage וְנִתְחַזַּק֙ <S%H2388><s%> and let us play the men בְּעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> the sake עַמֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5971><s%> for our people וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> the sake עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and for the cities אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> do הַטּ֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> him good בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> that which seemeth

וַיִּגַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> drew nigh יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab וְהָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> that [were] with him unto the battle בַּֽאֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> against the Syrians וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children עַמּ֤וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon רָאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָ֣ס <S%H5127><s%> were fled אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> that the Syrians וַיָּנֻ֙סוּ֙ <S%H5127><s%> then fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> they also before אֲבִישַׁ֔י <S%H52><s%> Abishai וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and entered הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> So Joab מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> from against בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> from the children עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיַּ֣רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> And when the Syrians כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגַּ֖ף <S%H5062><s%> that they were smitten לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיֵּאָסְפ֖וּ <S%H622><s%> they gathered יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> themselves together

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent הֲדַדְעֶ֗זֶר <S%H1909><s%> and Hadadezer וַיֹּצֵ֤א <S%H3318><s%> and brought out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> the Syrians אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who מֵעֵ֣בֶר <S%H5676><s%> that [were] beyond הַנָּהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> the river וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and they came חֵילָ֑ם <S%H2431><s%> to Helam וְשׁוֹבַ֛ךְ <S%H7731><s%> and Shobach שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> of the host הֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> [went] before

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> And when it was told לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David ס וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <S%H622><s%> together אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> all Israel וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and passed over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came חֵלָ֑אמָה <S%H2431><s%> to Helam וַיַּעַרְכ֤וּ <S%H6186><s%> set themselves in array אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> And the Syrians לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> against דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיִּלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and fought עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> against

וַיָּ֣נָס <S%H5127><s%> fled אֲרָם֮ <S%H758><s%> And the Syrians מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּהֲרֹ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> slew דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> and David מֵאֲרָ֗ם <S%H758><s%> of the Syrians שְׁבַ֤ע <S%H7651><s%> [the men of] seven מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred רֶ֔כֶב <S%H7393><s%> chariots וְאַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> and forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand פָּרָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6571><s%> horsemen וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> שׁוֹבַ֧ךְ <S%H7731><s%> Shobach שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> the captain צְבָא֛וֹ <S%H6635><s%> of their host הִכָּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> and smote וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> who died שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיִּרְא֨וּ <S%H7200><s%> saw כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּלָכִ֜ים <S%H4428><s%> And when all the kings עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> [that were] servants הֲדַדְעֶ֗זֶר <S%H1909><s%> of Hadadezer כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִגְּפוּ֙ <S%H5062><s%> that they were smitten לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וַיַּשְׁלִ֥מוּ <S%H7999><s%> they made peace אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> with Israel וַיַּֽעַבְד֑וּם <S%H5647><s%> and served וַיִּֽרְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> feared אֲרָ֔ם <S%H758><s%> them So the Syrians לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> to help ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> anymore אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon פ
